text: The Eye of the Storm is a 2011 Australian drama movie directed by Fred Schepisi and was based on the 1973 novel of the same name by Patrick White. It stars Charlotte Rampling, Geoffrey Rush, Judy Davis, Colin Friels, John Gaden, Helen Morse, Robyn Nevin. ==Other websites== * * Category:2011 drama movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Fred Schepisi Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies set in the 1970s
title: The Eye of the Storm (2011 movie)
